rules.specification: class with function with (parameter "java.lang.String" and annotation "org.eclipse.microprofile.reactive.messaging.Incoming" with parameter "java.lang.String value" )  must have annotation "javax.enterprise.context.Default"

class with (function with (annotation "javax.ws.rs.Path" and annotation "javax.ws.rs.POST" ) ) and annotation "javax.ws.rs.Path" must have annotation "org.eclipse.microprofile.rest.client.inject.RegisterRestClient"

function with annotation "org.eclipse.microprofile.opentracing.Traced" with parameter "boolean value"  must have annotation "org.eclipse.microprofile.opentracing.Traced" with parameter "java.lang.String operationName"
